text: William Thomas Hart (born February 4, 1929) is an American politician and lawyer. He was a Senior United States District Judge of the United States District Court for the Northern District of Illinois. He was made a judge in 1982 by President Ronald Reagan. Hart was born in Joliet, Illinois. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Illinois Category:American judges Category:Politicians from Illinois Category:People from Joliet, Illinois Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: William Thomas Hart
